name: Fellowes 14C10 14-Sheet Cross-Cut Home Office Paper Shredder
short_description: Enhanced Efficiency and Security: Effectively shreds 14 sheets of paper per pass into 5 /32” x 1-9/16” cross-cut particles (Security Level P-4), providing greater security for confidential documents
Powerful Deskside Shredding: Successfully shreds credit cards, paper clips, staples and unopened junk mail in addition to paper
Quiet Operation: Minimized noise to prevent distraction in shared workplaces or at home
Safety Lock for Added Protection: Comes equipped with patented Safety Lock, disabling the machine as needed to protect you, your family or your pets
Convenient Pull Out Bin to Eliminate Mess: 5-gallon pull out bin neatly contains over 250 shredded sheets
Superior Efficiency with 10 Minute Continuous Run-Time: Shreds up to 10 minutes before a cool down period is needed
Personal Shredder with Elevated Design: Sophisticated design completes every home and office interior
100plus Years of Innovation: Driven by a commitment to quality, Fellowes is dedicated to developing solutions to help you be at your best
product_description: The Fellowes 14C10 14-Sheet Cross-Cut Shredder is an ultra-efficient, high-security deskside shredder, designed for safe, long-term individual use. Shredding up to 14 sheets per pass into 5 /32” x 1-9/16” cross-cut particles, this shredder provides enhanced security for confidential documents (Security Level P-4) and the ability to shred staples, paper clips, credit cards and unopened junk mail. Thanks to the patented Safety Lock, you can quickly and easily disable the shredder as needed to protect yourself, your family and others. The 14C10’s sophisticated design enhances the interior of your space while eliminating mess, including a 5-gallon pull out waste bin that holds up to 250 shredded sheets. And to keep your shredding workflow on schedule, this shredder can continuously shred up to 10 minutes before a cool down period is needed. Designed for long-lasting durability, it also includes a 1-year product warranty, plus a 5-year cutter warranty.
